Dragonfly::

Dragonfly couldn't avoid the slash and he got a wound in the leg, he 
fired 25 shots to Hot Rod's chest

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He dropped low, and summer salted towards Dragonfly. As he came by 
he
> slashed at Dragonfly's leg with the saw. He was trying to make it 
hard
> for Dragonfly to move. He did this with the sid of his boosters, so 
it
> was fast, and would be hard to avoid.
